Friends

Distance: 850 meters. It's nearby Rooks and People's if you're looking to check out several bars in a night.

Price: A bit on the expensive side, since it's an upscale bar. You can expect for pay ~700 rubles per cocktail.

Foreigners tend to flock to this bar since it’s one of the only bars that comes up on Google Maps. Friend's has an upscale atmosphere, great drinks, and a small dance floor, although people don’t usually get up to dance until the wee hours of the night.

Find on 2GIS

Rooks

Distance: 850 meters

Price: It’s quite cheap compared to the other bars/clubs on this list.

A more hip and grungy bar. Although quite small, there is a DJ, and theme nights like hip-hop night. It’s a small room, but there is a dance floor. You can expect a younger crowd.

find on 2GIS

Twiggy

Distance: 500 meters

Price: Cocktails are ~700 rubles, beer ~400-500, food ~800.

Twiggy has two parts, the upscale upstairs, and the fisherman themed downstairs. Both have great atmosphere. The expat community meets upstairs here once a month with residents from all over the world.

find on 2GIS

Truba Jazz Club

Distance: In the city center.

Price: Average pricing.

Right in the city center, Truba is a hidden jazz bar with regular concerts and live music.

find on 2GIS

Blackmilk

Distance: 400 meters

Price: 700 rub/ cocktail

A more upscale bar for many foreigners and locals alike. There isn’t too much dancing, but it’s a nice place to listen to good music and hangout with friends. You will be expected to be nicely dressed.

find on 2GIS

The Chops

Distance: 950 meters.

Price: 600 rub/ Bloody Mary

American style bar with burgers and Bloody Mary's of all types. It's a small but 'happening' spot for breakfast, dinner, and drinks. It's casual and has great snacks like French fries, corn, and bacon. Think about it.... there's never a time you shouldn't be getting a Bloody Mary.

find on 2GIS
